posts.content:
Anything is only worth what someone is prepared to pay to complete the transaction. ..
Remember maddy was responding not placing for sale..
Knowing him ... it is tongue in cheek to test the water.
I bought a set and decided to sell them again for what I paid. .
They were usable. ..Not perfect...in fact needed work of various kinds..
A poster wanted some...I replied with details of what I had and condition and my opinion of what needed doing. ..asked my price...

Willing seller.....

Poster agreed price for condition..

Willing buyer.....

A deal was done...
He arranged shipping to the far North and was courteous and contacted me to confirm they were as I described and he was happy..
I like people who do that!
Even sent me pictures of them shod and in use...
So he was happy and I was quite happy...
Sweet Rides is only commenting and expressing his view...
I sent a PM to seeker on where to look and where he might find a deal. ..
I am a stock fan so wheels to match speedo gearing...equals right for year...
G
Still after some 15" slots for me to re-ferbâ€¦ tar
A have a couple of 15s mate!
